solution_line_template: First find how many pots fit on one shelf: {pots_per_vertical_stack} pots/set * {sets_side_by_side} sets = <<{pots_per_vertical_stack}*{sets_side_by_side}={pots_per_shelf}>>{pots_per_shelf} pots

Then divide the number of pots Bill has by the number that fit on each shelf: {total_pots} pots / {pots_per_shelf} pots/shelf = <<{total_pots}/{pots_per_shelf}={shelves_needed}>>{shelves_needed} shelves
